Name: World Puzzle
About the game: Classic puzzle with colorful pixel art author's drawings, each of which tells a story that you collect in pieces, connecting into a single whole picture, which is sure to come to life with the correct placement of all the puzzles. Features of game: Select the difficulty level Beautiful Pixel-Art Convenient control
